assessments.status_rationale: No decision from the September 2025 FOMC meeting has been reported; articles only indicate increased market expectations for a cut.
The performance window (2025-08-24 close to 2025-09-30 close) is ongoing; no conclusive comparative returns are available.
The preliminary August 2025 U.S. nonfarm payrolls report has not been released yet (expected early September).
No report of the VIX closing above 22.5; the window remains open through 2025-09-30.
No settlement at or above $94 for ICE Brent was reported; the window remains open through 2025-10-15.
No clear update on the ICE BofA US High Yield OAS relative to 2025-08-23; deadline is 2025-09-30.
No SEC Investor Alert or press release on unauthorized SPVs/secondary sales tied to private AI companies is reported; deadline is 2025-10-31.
